ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Urban Legends
ComicInfo.Summary:
The search for Casey Jones’ daughter continues, bringing to light new, startling truths. As the strain on the Turtles and their family grows, a determined Mikey takes matters into his own hands… but will he be able to escape a showdown with the mob?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Frank Fosco (a) & Courtland Brugger (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Frank Fosco (a), Erik Larsen (a), Reuben Rude (c) & I.H.O.C. (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 3 |
